data.description: Modules to interact with the Blogger API
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Apologies if this is redundant; I have already posted a request for
    a "Blogger" namespace. It was suggested that perhaps Net::Blogger
    was a more suitable choice and I agree. I'm not sure if I need to
    resubmit but for thoroughness' sake, I have.

    The Net::Blogger module provides a nice OOP wrapper for the Blogger
    XML-RPC API. The API has been ported to a number of other servers.
